scripts.package:chrome: shx rm -rf dist/chrome && shx cp -rf src/chrome dist/chrome && shx cp -rf src/assets dist/chrome/assets && shx cp dist/index.js dist/chrome/index.js
scripts.package:firefox: shx rm -rf dist/firefox && shx cp -rf src/firefox dist/firefox && shx cp -rf src/assets dist/firefox/assets && shx cp dist/index.js dist/firefox/index.js && cd dist/firefox && 7z a -r ./twitch_chat_overlay.zip
